sentences.english: It increased plough layer soil water and available nutrients content.
sentences.chinese: 大豆覆膜增加了土壤水分與速效養分含量。

sentences.english: To be sure, there are no quick fixes to Europe's debt woes.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲的債務危機肯定沒有速效藥。

sentences.english: Olsen-P was thought as an important indication for P application.
sentences.chinese: 速效磷可以作爲施磷量的一個重要指示指標。

sentences.english: All of these straw treatments raised the content of olsen-P and effective K in soil.
sentences.chinese: 所有秸稈處理都提高了土壤中速效磷和速效鉀的含量。

sentences.english: All of these straw treatments raised the content of olsen-P and effective K in soil.
sentences.chinese: 所有秸稈處理都提高了土壤中速效磷和速效鉀的含量。

sentences.english: Like so many good things in modern life, motivation isoften seen as a quick-fix.
sentences.chinese: 和許多現代生活中的好東西一樣，動力往往也很速效。

sentences.english: The fast-acting tablets will begin to fight an allergic reaction while you wait for help to arrive.
sentences.chinese: 這些速效藥將在你等待救援時控制你的過敏反應。

sentences.english: This study investigated the effect of soil nitrogen regulator on soil available nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 研究了土壤氮素調理劑對土壤速效氮含量的影響。

sentences.english: The caloric content of leaf and stolon increased while that of inflorescence decreased with the rising of QAP.
sentences.chinese: 葉片和匍匐莖的能量與土壤速效磷濃度呈正比。

sentences.english: The effect of quick-acting phosphorous (QAP) concentration in soil on vertical distribution of T. repens was significant.
sentences.chinese: 土壤速效磷濃度對白三葉地上部的垂直分佈影響顯著。

sentences.english: One of these easy and effective ways is by chewing fresh parsley.
sentences.chinese: 一個比較速效的方法是嚼新鮮香芹。

sentences.english: The available K in tea-growing soils was markedly increased by K2S04 fertilizer.
sentences.chinese: 施用硫酸鉀能明顯增加茶園土壤中的速效硫含量。

sentences.english: Desorbed P was significantly correlated with soil available P and P uptake by Plant.
sentences.chinese: 解吸P量與土壤速效P和植物吸收P均有顯著相關。

definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine
to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
